action.text: Cloture on amendment SA 1958 as modified not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 45. Record Vote Number: 35.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 1958 as modified presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 1958 proposed by Senator Schumer to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. 1959. (consideration: CR S931, S959-965; text as modified: CR S959-965) Of a perfecting nature.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 1958 as modified not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 45. Record Vote Number: 35.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1958 proposed by Senator Schumer to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. 1959.
